############################################################################
# Occupancy Transition Matrices for Pattern 3                              
#                                                                              
# note: contains three 48x3 matrices                                       
#       rows   = time-bin 1 to 48                                          
#		         (each time-bin = 30 minutes)                              
#       column = cumulative percentage of probability for next state       
#				 column 1 = next state = 1 (="at home and awake")          
#				 column 2 = next state = 2 (="sleeping")                   
#				 column 3 = next state = 3 (="absent")                     
#		example  														   
#       If State 2 (="sleeping") ended during time-bin 7 (between 7AM and  
#                 7:30AM)  the probability that the next state will be     
#                  - State 1 (="at home and awake") is 1000.00%			   
#				   - State 3 (="absent") is 0.00%						   
############################################################################

# Current State = 1 ("at home and awake")
